10#include <typeinfo>
11
12namespace std
13{
14
15// type_info
16
17type_info::~type_info()
18{
19}
20
21// bad_cast
22
23bad_cast::bad_cast() _NOEXCEPT
24{
25}
26
27bad_cast::~bad_cast() _NOEXCEPT
28{
29}
30
31const char*
32bad_cast::what() const _NOEXCEPT
33{
34 return "std::bad_cast";
35}
36
37// bad_typeid
38

40{
41}
42

44{
45}
46
47const char*
48bad_typeid::what() const _NOEXCEPT

51}
